Describe...
- The page and the text you would like changed, ideally in both *English* and *French*.
- The page and the formatting you would like altered.

**Advanced**
If you are comfortable with Markdown, consider [editing the file](https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/working-with-files/managing-files/editing-files) in the web browser and submitting those edits as a Pull Request (suggested change). You will need a GitHub account to do so.
